typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	EnableEmailSend as string ('true'),
	EnableEmailOpen as string ('true'),
	EnableEmailClick as string ('true'),
	EnableEmailBounce as string ('true'),
	LastPosition as string (''),
	NullExternalId as string ('e597a37c-5d7b-ea11-a811-000d3ad0f227')
}
source(output(
		event as ({com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent} as (birthDate as string, campaignName as string, count as long, deliveryLabel as string, deliveryName as string, domain as string, eventSource as string, eventType as string, failureReason as long, failureType as long, mPageHost as string, mirrorPageId as string, profileExternalId as string, recipientId as long, recurringDelId as long, segmentCode as string, status as long, timestamp as string, trackingUrl as string, trackingUrlLabel as string, trackingUrlType as long), genericBytes as string, header as ({_adobeio} as (eventCode as string, imsOrgId as string, instanceId as string, providerMetadata as string), {_smarts} as (definitionId as string, runningSmartId as string), imsOrg as string, messageType as string, pipelineMessageId as string, sandboxId as string, sandboxName as string, sentTime as string, source as string)),
		next as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'adobeevent',
	lastEventPosition: ($LastPosition),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EventSource
EventSource select(mapColumn(
		eventType = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.eventType,
		adobe_campaignname = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.campaignName,
		adobe_deliveryname = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.deliveryName,
		mPageHost = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.mPageHost,
		mirrorPageId = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.mirrorPageId,
		profileExternalId = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.profileExternalId,
		adobe_senton = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.timestamp,
		status = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.status,
		count = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.count,
		trackingUrl = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.trackingUrl,
		trackingUrlType = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.trackingUrlType,
		trackingUrlLabel = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.trackingUrlLabel,
		failureType = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.failureType,
		failureReason = event.{com.adobe.mcloud.protocol.campaignReportingEvent}.failureReason,
		next
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> H2R
ConditionalSplit1@EmailSend select(mapColumn(
		eventType,
		adobe_campaignname,
		adobe_deliveryname,
		adobe_senton,
		subject,
		adobe_mirrorpageurl,
		activityid,
		regardingobjectid,
		regardingobjectid_owner
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmailSendColumns
CreateNewColumns split($EnableEmailSend == 'true' && eventType == 'DELIVERY' && status == 1 && count == 1,
	$EnableEmailOpen == 'true' && eventType == 'TRACKING' && trackingUrlType == 2 && trackingUrlLabel == 'Open',
	$EnableEmailClick == 'true' && eventType == 'TRACKING' && in([1, 10, 11], trackingUrlType) && !isNull(trackingUrl) && trackingUrl != '' && !isNull(trackingUrlLabel) && trackingUrlLabel != '',
	$EnableEmailBounce == 'true' && eventType == 'DELIVERY' && status == 2 && failureType == 2 && failureReason != 8,
	!isNull(next) && next!='',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(EmailSend, EmailOpen, EmailClick, EmailBounce, Next, unkown)
ConditionalSplit1@Next select(mapColumn(
		last = next
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNextLink
H2R derive(subject = 'Campaign Name: ' + toString(adobe_campaignname)  + '; Delivery ID: ' + toString(adobe_deliveryname),
		adobe_mirrorpageurl = toString(mPageHost) + "/rest/head/mirrorPage/" + toString(mirrorPageId) + ".html?mode=preview",
		activityid = uuid(),
		regardingobjectid = iif(profileExternalId === '', $NullExternalId, profileExternalId),
		adobe_senton = toTimestamp(toLong(toDouble(adobe_senton)/1000)),
		regardingobjectid_owner = 'contact') ~> CreateNewColumns
ConditionalSplit1@EmailOpen select(mapColumn(
		eventType,
		adobe_campaignname,
		adobe_deliveryname,
		adobe_openedon = adobe_senton,
		subject,
		adobe_mirrorpageurl,
		activityid,
		regardingobjectid,
		regardingobjectid_owner
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmailOpenColumns
ConditionalSplit1@EmailClick select(mapColumn(
		eventType,
		adobe_campaignname,
		adobe_deliveryname,
		adobe_clickedon = adobe_senton,
		subject,
		adobe_trackingurl = trackingUrl,
		adobe_mirrorpageurl,
		activityid,
		regardingobjectid,
		regardingobjectid_owner
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmailClickColumns
ConditionalSplit1@EmailBounce select(mapColumn(
		eventType,
		adobe_campaignname,
		adobe_deliveryname,
		adobe_bouncedon = adobe_senton,
		subject,
		adobe_mirrorpageurl,
		activityid,
		regardingobjectid,
		regardingobjectid_owner
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmailBounceColumns
SelectNextLink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['nextlink.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> NextLink
SelectEmailSendColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emailSendStaging.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> EmailSendStaging
SelectEmailOpenColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emailOpenStaging.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> EmailOpenStaging
SelectEmailClickColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emailClickStaging.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> EmailClickStaging
SelectEmailBounceColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emailBounceStaging.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> EmailBounceStaging
SelectNextLink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> BackupNextLink
